snippet: A look at the roster of exhibitors at C.E.S. reveals more than 200 companies that not only hail from the Chinese city Shenzhen, but include the city's name in their own.
abstract: A look at the roster of exhibitors at C.E.S. reveals more than 200 companies that not only hail from the Chinese city Shenzhen, but include the city's name in their own.

headline.main: What's in a Name? At C.E.S., Oftentimes, It's Shenzhen
